sentences.sContent: It might sound like a fantasy, but it wasn't an erotic experience at all.
sentences.sCn: 这听起来像一场梦幻，但绝不是一次性爱体验。

synos.tran: 色情的；[生物]性爱的；性欲的

words.tran: 色情；性的兴奋，性欲亢进；性爱倾向
使充满色情，使更加色情

trans.tranOther: an erotic book, picture, or film shows people having sex, and is intended to make people reading or looking at it have feelings of sexual pleasure
